style_guide.visual_style: High-quality Korean webtoon style with clean digital illustration, soft natural colors, expressive faces, modern fashion, atmospheric lighting
style_guide.segment_story: A conversation between a male and female friend at the gym. The female asks if the male is going to the gym, and he invites her along. They discuss workout schedules (evening around 6pm), exercise preferences (weights and cardio), and duration (about an hour). The conversation shifts to motivation as they work out together, encouraging each other to push harder and complete one more set. They are shown exercising side by side in a modern gym setting.

images.prompt_used:
# Korean Webtoon Opening Scene - Gym Entrance Conversation

A high-quality Korean webtoon style illustration showing two young Korean friends meeting at a modern gym entrance. The handsome male character in his early 20s stands on the right wearing a stylish navy blue zip-up hoodie over a white athletic t-shirt, short textured black hair with natural volume, warm friendly brown eyes with a confident smile. The energetic female character in her early 20s stands on the left wearing a fitted grey tank top with white trim and light coral zip-up hoodie draped over her shoulders, medium-length brown hair in a casual high ponytail with soft strands framing her face, warm friendly smile showing approachability.

They are positioned naturally in the same space, both filling significant frame space in 3/4 view angles, facing slightly toward each other in casual conversation stance. The male character gestures welcomingly while the female character holds a small gym towel, both with energetic expressions suggesting they're discussing workout plans.

Premium Lezhin Comics webtoon quality digital painting. Smooth gradient shading, soft cell-shading technique, clean lines without harsh outlines. Natural lighting from front creating soft depth on both characters. Soft rim lighting highlighting their hair edges. Natural skin tones with subtle blush on cheeks, sparkle highlights in eyes.

Detailed modern gym environment background: sleek glass entrance doors, contemporary fitness center interior visible behind them with exercise equipment slightly blurred, modern gray and white color scheme, motivational atmosphere, soft bokeh effect, clean professional gym aesthetic. Warm atmospheric lighting suggesting early evening around 6pm with natural and artificial light blend.

Single unified composition, characters interacting in the same cohesive space, no split-screen, no divider lines. Soft natural color palette with warm tones. Professional webtoon rendering with smooth color transitions, polished digital illustration quality.

1080x1080 pixels, square format, no text, no watermarks, vertical webtoon panel aesthetic, premium quality artwork.

# Korean Webtoon Style - Gym Invitation Scene

A high-quality Korean webtoon style illustration showing a dynamic gym interior scene with depth. The handsome young Korean male (early 20s) is positioned in the right foreground, shown from shoulders up in a 3/4 back view, looking back over his shoulder toward the viewer's left with an inviting friendly smile. He wears a stylish navy blue zip-up hoodie over white athletic t-shirt. Short textured black Korean hairstyle with natural volume, warm friendly brown eyes with sparkle highlights, natural blush on cheeks, clean masculine jawline, encouraging welcoming expression.

The young Korean female (early 20s) is visible in the left middle-ground, approximately 6-8 feet behind him, shown from waist up, facing toward the male character with an excited interested expression and warm smile. She wears a fitted grey tank top with white trim and light coral zip-up hoodie draped over shoulders. Medium-length brown hair in casual high ponytail with soft strands framing face. Clear sparkle highlights in dark brown eyes, natural rosy blush on cheeks, energetic body language showing she's considering the invitation.

Modern gym interior environment surrounds them with depth: sleek exercise equipment visible in the background, weight racks, treadmills, large windows showing evening light, clean contemporary fitness center aesthetic. Warm atmospheric lighting creates depth and dimension between foreground and background.

Professional Korean webtoon digital painting style, Lezhin Comics premium quality. Smooth gradient shading, soft cell-shading technique, clean lines without harsh outlines. Natural lighting creates soft depth and separation between characters. Warm color palette with natural skin tones.

Dynamic composition with foreground/background layering showing the invitation moment. Characters looking at each other, not at viewer. High detail on facial features and clothing. Clean professional webtoon rendering with smooth gradients.

1080x1080 pixels, no text, no watermarks, unified scene with environmental depth.

Short textured black Korean hairstyle with natural volume, soft rim lighting highlighting the hair edges. Warm friendly brown eyes with subtle sparkle highlights, natural blush on cheeks. # Korean Webtoon Style - Side-by-Side Workout Scene

A high-quality Korean webtoon style illustration showing two young Korean friends exercising side by side in a modern gym, captured from a low side angle at equipment level. 

The male character (early 20s) is on the left: handsome Korean male with short textured black hair with natural volume, warm friendly brown eyes, clean masculine jawline, wearing a stylish navy blue zip-up hoodie over white athletic t-shirt. He's mid-workout on a treadmill or stationary bike, leaning forward slightly with focused expression, looking down at the equipment display showing time elapsed.

The female character (early 20s) is on the right, slightly closer to camera: young Korean woman with medium-length brown hair in a casual high ponytail with soft strands framing her face, wearing a fitted grey tank top with white trim and light coral zip-up hoodie draped over her shoulders. She's on matching exercise equipment beside him, also mid-workout, glancing sideways toward her friend with an encouraging smile, showing determination and energy.

# Korean Webtoon Style - Motivational Spotting Scene

A high-quality Korean webtoon style illustration with a dramatic LOW ANGLE perspective looking upward. 

A young Korean female in her early 20s is shown from a lower angle, lying back on a workout bench performing a challenging press exercise. She wears a fitted grey tank top with white trim and a light coral zip-up hoodie (pushed back/draped). Her medium-length brown hair is tied in a casual high ponytail with strands slightly disheveled from exertion. Her face shows intense concentration and determination, cheeks flushed with effort, dark brown eyes focused upward, brow slightly furrowed, breathing hard but pushing through. Sparkle highlights in her eyes show determination.

Standing behind and above her, the handsome young Korean male in his early 20s is positioned as a spotter. He wears a stylish athletic fit navy blue zip-up hoodie over a white athletic t-shirt. Short textured black Korean hairstyle with natural volume, soft rim lighting on hair edges. His warm friendly brown eyes look down at her with encouraging intensity, natural blush on cheeks. He has an encouraging, motivating expression - mouth slightly open as if saying the words of encouragement, leaning forward slightly with hands positioned ready to spot. Clean masculine jawline, athletic build visible.

Modern gym environment with professional equipment visible - the weight bench, bar with weights, gym mirrors in background reflecting ambient gym lighting. Evening atmosphere with warm artificial gym lights creating dramatic shadows and highlights. Other gym equipment softly blurred in background depth.

# Korean Webtoon Style - Triumphant Team Encouragement Scene

The composition focuses on their hands meeting in a victorious fist-bump gesture in the center-foreground of the frame, with their smiling faces visible behind their extended arms.

The male character on the left: handsome with short textured black Korean hairstyle with natural volume, warm friendly brown eyes full of encouragement, confident smile showing teeth, wearing navy blue zip-up hoodie over white athletic t-shirt, athletic build visible. His right arm extended forward for the fist-bump, showing determination and support.

Her left arm extended forward meeting his fist-bump, radiating confidence.

In the mid-ground left, a handsome young Korean male in his early 20s is captured mid-squat with a weighted barbell across his shoulders. He wears a stylish athletic fit navy blue zip-up hoodie (unzipped) over a white athletic t-shirt, modern gym-casual style. Short textured black Korean hairstyle with natural volume, soft rim lighting highlighting the hair edges. His face shows intense concentration with furrowed brow, looking downward at his form, warm brown eyes focused, natural blush from exertion. Athletic build, strong stance, knees bent in proper squat position.

In the mid-ground right, slightly closer to camera, a young Korean female in her early 20s is performing dumbbell shoulder presses, arms raised with dumbbells at ear level. She wears a fitted grey tank top with white trim and light coral zip-up hoodie draped over one shoulder. Medium-length brown hair in a casual high ponytail with strands falling loose from effort.
